Uses of Package
atlantafx.base.util

Packages that use atlantafx.base.util
Package
Description
atlantafx.base.controls
Defines the UI controls and their corresponding skins.
atlantafx.base.util
Provides various utility classes, formatters and converters.
  • Classes in atlantafx.base.util used by atlantafx.base.controls
    Class
    Description
    MaskChar
    Provides basic API for defining an input mask.
    MaskTextFormatter
    A TextFormatter that can restrict the user input by applying a position-based mask.
    PasswordTextFormatter
    An alternative to the PasswordField class.
  • Classes in atlantafx.base.util used by atlantafx.base.util
    Class
    Description
    BBCodeHandler
    The basic handler interface for the BBCodeParser that will receive notifications while processing user input text.
    BBCodeHandler.Block
    A generic block record.
    BBCodeHandler.Tag
    Generic tag record.
    BBCodeHandler.Tag.Type
     
    DoubleStringConverter
    Converts between user-edited strings and Double values.
    IntegerStringConverter
    Converts between user-edited strings and integer values.

    Provides basic API for defining an input mask.
    MaskTextFormatter
    A TextFormatter that can restrict the user input by applying a position-based mask.
    MaskTextFormatter.MaskTextFilter
     
    PasswordTextFormatter
    An alternative to the PasswordField class.
    PasswordTextFormatter.PasswordFilter
     
    SimpleMaskChar
    The default MaskChar implementation that should be suitable for anything except heavily custom logic.
